alert.note: Alert for Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:53PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Linn, southeastern Buchanan, southwestern Delaware and northwestern Jones Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 253 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Troy Mills, or 13 miles southeast of Independence, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coggon and Ryan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
